{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = SD-WAN LTE Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Viptela |model = vEdge |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 100m-AC |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = LTE |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = 4G LTE router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = N7NMC7355 |icid = 2417C-MC7355 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CN7020; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = 64 |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 800 MHz / 1 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = STMicro;M25P32V6G; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = eMMC |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Micron;MTFC4GACAAAM-1M WT; |flash2size = 4 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16TW-107; |ram1_num = 4 |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 512 |ram2chip = Micron;MT41K256M8DA-107; |ram2_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Vitesse;VSC8514; |eth3chip = Vitesse;VSC8501; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 80:B7:09 |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2013.07;; |stockos = Linux;3.10.62;-ltsi;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 3.0 (Type A), SIM Card slot |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 1 |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = C5
|serial = yes,, USB Female Micro-B,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 10-pin header,, populated,, J21
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = 4G LTE modem, GPS receiver, RTC w/ battery, PoE out, heatsink, fan |addchip = GPS Module;Telit;Jupiter SE880;;1;,,, CPLD;Altera;EPM1270F265C5N;;1;,,, USB to Basic UART IC;FTDI;FT230X;;1;,,, I2C TPM Device;Renesas;R5H30211;;1;,,, 2K Serial EEPROM;STMicro;24C02WP;;1;,,, I2C RTC w/SRAM;Microchip;MPC7940N;;1;,,, 500mA Low Dropout Regulator;TI;LM2937;;2;,,, System Temperature Monitor;ON Semi;ADM1032;;1;,,, 3.7A 100V N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDT3612;;1;,,, 512 Kbit serial I2C bus EEPROM;STMicro;M24512-R;;2;,,, 4-bit Low-Voltage FET Bus Switch;TI;SN74CB3Q3257;;1;,,, 1.5A Adjustable LDO Linear Regulator;TI;LP38852-ADJ;;1;,,, 13W Single POE Controller;Linear Technology;LTC4274C;;1;,,, 52A 100V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AOD2908;;1;,,, 100V Isolated Flyback Controller;Linear Technology;LT3748;;1;,,, Complementary Power Darlington Transistor;STMicro;MJD122;;1;,,, Dual N-Channel Logic Level PWM MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS6898A;;4;,,, Dual Channel High Speed Logic Gate Optocoupler;Fairchild;HCPL-2631;;2;,,, Integrated 3A Synchronous Buck Regulator;International Rectifier;IR3823;;1;,,, N-Channel MOSFET Synchronous Buck Regulator Controller;National Semi;LM2743;;4;,,, 4-Input 3-Output Any-to-Any Clock Multiplier & Frequency Synthesizer IC;Microsemi;ZL30251;;1; |802dot11_protocols = 4G LTE
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Interface Masters |manuf_model = Niagra 820 |manuf_rev = REV F2 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 01/30/2022 |fccapprovdate = 11/28/2012 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = USA
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Sierra Wireless AirPrime MC7354 |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;MDM9615; |rad1chip2 = Qualcomm;WTR1605L; |rad1chip3 = Anadigics;ALT6526; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = 4G LTE |rad1freq = <!-- 2.4 or 5, Frequency band(s) of this radio -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Cavium]]'' CN7020 Dual-core [[MIPS64]] (@800MHz) *Memory: 2GB (SDRAM) DDR3L *Storage: 4MB SPI Flash, 4GB eMMC Flash *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports, 1 w/802.3af PoE *LTE: [[Sierra Wireless AirPrime MC7354]] :FCC ID: N7NMC7355 (2012-11-28) *USB: 1x USB 3.0 host port *Expansion: 2x Mini PCIe *Power: 12V, 1.5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== [https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/routers/sdwan/vedge/hardware/vEdge-routers-hardware-installation-guide/vEdge-routers-hardware-installation-guide_chapter_0101.html Installation Guide] * [https://interfacemasters.com/pdf/appliances/Niagara820-ProductBrief.pdf OEM Datasheet]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Viptela vEdge 100m-AC Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Viptela vEdge 100m-AC Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:Viptela vEdge 100m-AC Internal view.jpeg|Internal View </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
